cstro91: So. I was "lucky enough" last week to get detailed to guard an Access Control Point 0600-1800. Meow, I'm sure you're asking, "huh?" In this pandemic circumstance, it's me asking every person through the gate whether or not they have coughed in the past 24 hours. I was bored and grumpy. What do ya do when you're bored and grumpy? Surf the interwebs, obvi. Now, I have owned this book for many years. I have never read it... Too many more serious novels lying around. Thank you for laying bare my mistake. Watching these posts inspired me to ask, not only "have you coughed," but-for example-"what is the air speed velocity of an unladen swallow?" You inspired me to brighten my day and make an assortment of frowning soldiers and spouses laugh. So again, thank you!
